articles.title: AFC Asian Cup 2023 Draw Highlights: India in Group B With Syria, Uzbekistan and Australia - News18
articles.description: AFC Asian Cup Draw Highlights: The Indian men's football team led by Sunil Chhetri will face Syria, Uzbekistan and Australia in the delayed quadrenial continental tournament
